name: Saitek CCB437030002/04/1 Wired Laser Mouse
Features: [True 3200dpi laser sensor, DPI adjustment from 400 to 3200dpi in 100dpi steps, 9 user definable commands via 3 programmable buttons and 3 position mode switch, Four user-definable DPI settings, Remap programmable buttons and create custom macros with the powerful SST software]
